title: Vanquish
description: In this final installment of the Parched novel series, the world has certainly been changed - and not for the better.The sun has disappeared and the Evil, by way of Lario Exgesis, has been successful in creating a deadlier vampire species. Fortunately, the Daughters of Benel and Sons of Gogulon were created specifically for these times and they will not stop fighting until they've landed a crushing blow and supplant Lario Exgesisâ€™s plan to rule the Earth.
author: Z.L. Arkadie
